messages.title: A VOTE FOR THE LIB DEMS IS A VOTE FOR THE TORIES
messages.content: Labour came second in Croydon South in 2017. The Lib Dems cannot win here. While the Tory MP dropped his remain principles the minute he was offered a job by Boris Johnson, I will never support any Brexit deal that threatens jobs or public services in Croydon South. I will continue to campaign for remain. Vote Labour for a final say.

messages.title: DEFENDING OUR NHS
messages.content: Every aspect of a Tory government endangers our NHS. Whether that's a trade deal with the US that allows the NHS to be privatised, or the continued underfunding of our hospitals and elderly care. A Labour government will deliver a properly funded NHS and fair pay for our dedicated public sector workers. I will work with our local hospital to abolish the unfair parking charges.

messages.title: IMPROVING PUBLIC TRANSPORT & REDUCING POLLUTION
messages.content: I often experience the misery of cancelled trains on Southern Rail. Labour would give us back control over our railways. I fully support the Mayor of London's plans to bring Southern Rail under TfL control. As a local mum, I worry about the air quality around the A23. We need a fast, reliable public transport system to reduce pollution. I will work with TfL to make sure Croydon South is not forgotten.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A Labour government will deliver a properly funded NHS and fair pay for our dedicated public sector workers, and work with the local hospital to abolish unfair parking charges.
Labour would bring Southern Rail under Transport for London's control and work to reduce pollution and improve air quality around the A23.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Labour came second in Croydon South in 2017, and the Lib Dems cannot win here.

issues.brexitEurope: Will never support any Brexit deal that threatens jobs or public services in Croydon South and will continue to campaign for remain.
issues.environment: Concerned about air quality around the A23 and will work to reduce pollution.
issues.governance: Supports the Mayor of London's plans to bring Southern Rail under TfL control.
issues.health: A Labour government will deliver a properly funded NHS and fair pay for our dedicated public sector workers. Will work with local hospital to abolish the unfair parking charges.

leaflet.personalStatement: I hope you will support me, a strong and effective campaigner who will listen to residents and get things done for Croydon South

images.caption: Olga FitzRoy with text stating her commitment to Croydon South and her party affiliation with Labour.
